entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
